name: Nova
aliases: Nova Prime, Kid Nova, Nova #11249-44396, The Human Rocket, Quasar
powersText: Flight Superhuman strength, speed, and durability Expert hand to hand combatant Currently in possession, via download, of the  Xandar ian Worldmind which allows him near infinite control over the Nova Force granting energy projection and absorption Ability to exert influence over  gravitational force s and open  wormhole s
